page.title: 12My Life in Ollerton
page.content: When it is time to go back to school I go and call for my friends. When I get back to school I play until the bell goes. When we get back into school we go to drama. At drama we play games and make up little plays. After that we go to music; we sing a lot of songs and tape them. After music it is time for playtime and we go out to play. When we come in from play we carry on with our work and then we have a story. Then after half an hour the bell goes for home time. I walk home on my own and when I get home I have my tea and then I watch childrens I.T.V., then go out to play with my friend Alison. We play hide and seek and sometimes we play in my bedroom. At 8 p.m. I go in and have my supper and then I go and have a bath; after which I watch television until 9 p.m. then I go to bed.
